Posts.Content: Thanks, youre right, it does help that I,m not the only one that feels like this. Im so glad I’ve been cancer free for this long but th3 fear of its return does gnaw away a bit. I’ll let you know how it goes
Posts.Title: Your annual check up freaking you out?

Posts.Content: Hi this is my first post. It’s been 6 years since my 2 ops for breast cancer at 44. Â My check up is at 2pm tomorrow - wait today. I haven’t slept more than 4 hours each night for a few days. Am I the only one that seems to do ok for 11 out of 12 months then becomes a wreck for 1? And every year I think I get worse, any advice?
Posts.Title: Your annual check up freaking you out?
